refnamediv.refpurpose: Generate a distribution expression from a service and infrastructure expression

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The command disnix-gendist-roundrobin generates a distribution expression from a given services and infrastructure expression. It uses the round robin scheduling method to distribute every service in the services model over each machine in the infrastructure in equal proportions and order.

listitem.para: Services Nix expression which describes all components of the distributed system
Infrastructure Nix expression which captures properties of machines in the network
Shows the usage of this command to the user.
